titleStmt.title: A Breife description or character of the religion and manners of the phanatiques in generall. Scil. [brace] Anabaptists, Independents, Brovvnists, Enthusiasts, Levellers, Quakers, Seekers, Fift-Monarchy-Men, & Dippers. Shewing and refuting theur absurdities by due application, reflecting much also on Sir Iohn Præcisian and other novelists. Non seria semper.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by most stationers;,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
